title: PM grieved over sad demise of Fakhruddin G. Ebrahim
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 7 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan on Tuesday expressed his deep sorrow and grief over the sad demise of renowned jurist Justice ® Fakhruddin G. Ebrahim.
In a condolence message, the prime minister said the invaluable services rendered by late Justice ® Fakhruddin G. Ebrahim in the field of law and the provision of justice would be remembered long.
He prayed for the eternal peace of the deceased and for the fortitude of the bereaved family.
